column2: rjes su dpag pa 'das pa la sogs pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dag la yang 'jug par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / don byed par thal bar 'gyur ba'i yang phyir ro //

column1: para citta anumAne pyaBipreta arTa avisaMvAdaH sti eva
column2: gzhan gyi sems rjes su dpag pa la yang mngon par 'dod pa'i don la mi slu ba yod pa kho na ste /

column1: tad pravartana dvAreNa prANi antara sat tAm pratipadya punar punar vyavahAra pravRttO tadA aDipati AdAga arTasya prApteH
column2: 'jug par byed pa de'i sgo nas srog chags gzhan yod par rtogs nas yang nas yang du tha snyad dag la 'jug na / de'i dbang gis 'byung ba'i don thob pa'i phyir ro //

column1: tanmAtra Pala cintakasya lokasya prANi antara anumAne pravRtteH ca
column2: 'jig rten ni 'bras bu de tsam la sems shing srog chags gzhan rjes su dpag pa la 'jug pa'i yang phyir te /

column1: uttara arTa viSeza pratiBAsi jQAna anuBava udaya mAtreNa puruzasya nirAkAFkza tvAt
column2: skyes bu don phyi ma'i khyad par du snang ba'i shes pa myong ba tsam gyis re ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

column1: pUrva jQAnena vyavahAra samApteH kRtArTata tvam pramANa tvena sidDa tvAt nanu svapne pi pUrva jQAnAt uttara arTa pratiBAsi jQAnam utpadyate
column2: shes pa snga mas tha snyad rdzogs pas don byas pa nyid tshad ma nyid du grub pa'i phyir ro // rmi lam na yang shes pa snga ma las don phyi mar snang ba'i shes pa skye ba ma // yin na ma /

column1: na tanmAtreNa pUrva jQAnasya prAmANyam yujyate
column2: de tsam gyis ni shes pa snga ma tshad ma yin par 'os pa ma // yin na ma / yin te /

column1: tadAnIm sarvezAm jQAnAnAm BrAnta tvAt
column2: de'i tshe shes pa thams cad 'khrul ba yin pa'i phyir ro // yin na ma / yin te /

column1: tatra vijQapti jQAnam na kadAcid citta spandana ADipatyena vinA udBavati iti atas tAByAm ye anumIyate
column2: zhe na / 'dir rnam par rig byed kyi shes pa ni nam yang sems kyi g-yo pa'i dbang med par mi // yin na ma / yin te / zhe na / 'byung bas / de dag gis kyang di dag rjes su dpog par byed do //

column1: BrAnti vaSAt kadAcid vyavahite pi udeti
column2: 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ni res 'ga' bar du chod kyang 'byung ste /

column1: na tu tad ADipatya rahita tvam viSezaH tu asti sAkzAt paramparayA ca iti uktam
column2: de dag gi dbang gis stong pa ni ma yin gyi mngon sum dang brgyud pa zhes pa'i khyad par 'di ni yod do zhes bshad zin to //

column1: tatra yaTA pUrva vijQapti jQAnAnAm paramparayA spandana ADipatyAt udayaH taTA tad uttara avasTA BAvinAm api
column2: de la ji ltar rnam par rig byed @359a * // kyi shes pa snga ma rnams brgyud de g-yo ba'i dbang gis skye ba ltar / de'i 'og rol gyi gnas skabs na yod pa dag kyang de dang 'dra'o //

column1: vijQapti jQAna ASraya spandana uttara avasTA citta santAnAt eva paramparayA utpAdaH
column2: rnam par rig byed kyi shes pa'i rten g-yo ba'i gnas skabs phyi ma'i sems kyi rgyud kho na las brgyud de skye'o // de yang rjes su dpag pa ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i mi slu ba dang brgyud de skye'o //

column1: tatra api yAdRS anumAnam tAdRS avisaMvAdaH vyavahAraH ca api asti eva iti kena api na gRhyate
column2: / tha snyad kyang yod pa kho na yin pas cis kyang mi gzung ngo //

column1: para citta anumAnena tad svarUpa agrahe pyavisaMvAdAt Bavatu taTA prAmANyam sAkzAt para citta vidAm tu kaTam
column2: gzhan gyi sems kyi rjes su dpag pa ni de'i rang gi ngo bo mi 'dzin kyang mi slu ba'i phyir de ltar tshad ma nyid yin du chug na gzhan gyi sems mngon sum du shes pa rnams kyis go // ji ltar /

column1: yadi te para cittasya svarUpam sAkzAt jAnanti tadA tasya arTa antara grahaNam syAt
column2: gal te gzhan gyi sems kyis rang gi ngo bo mngon sum du shes par gyur na ni de'i gzung ba don gzhan yin par 'gyur ro //

column1: aTa na jAnanti kaTam te sAkzAt vidaH
column2: mi shes na ni de dag ji ltar mngon sum du shes pa yin /

column1: kaTam nAma pratyakzeNa arTa svarUpasya agrahaNam ca Bavati
column2: ji ltar mngon sum gyi don gyi rang gi ngo bo mi 'dzin par yang 'gyur /

column1: aTa na gRhyate kaTam tarhi pramANam iti ced
column2: 'on te mi 'dzin na ni ji ltar tshad ma yin zhe na /

column1: aprahINa grAhya grAhaka vikalpa yoginAm para citta jQAnam api vyavahAre visaMvAdAt eva pramANam rUpa Adi darSana vat ASraya aparAvRteH
column2: gnas ma gyur ba'i phyir rnal 'byor pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma spangs pa rnams kyis gzhan gyis sems shes pa yang / tha snyad la mi slu ba nyid kyis gzugs la sogs pa mthong ba bzhin du tshad ma nyid yin no //

column1: yoga balAt hi tezAm jQAnam para citta AkAra viSeza anukAri sPuwa ABam upajAyate
column2: rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis ni de dag la shes pa gzhan gyi sems kyi rnam pa'i bye brag gi / rjes su byed pa gsal bar snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur te /

column1: karma deva Adi aDizWAna balAt satya svapna darSana vat tezAm api na para citta vizayi tvena jQAnam udeti
column2: las dang lha la sogs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis rmi lam bden pa mthong ba bzhin no // de dag la yang gzhan gyi sems kyi yul can nyid kyi shes pa 'byung ba ni ma yin // te /

column1: te pi tad AkAra sadRSa sva citta pratiBAsam eva jAnanti iti evam avaDAraNAt para citta vidaH iti vyavahAraH
column2: de dag kyang rang gi sems snang ba de dang / rnam pa mtshungs pa kho na nyid shes pa las / gzhan gyi sems shes pa zhes bya ba nges par gzungs bas tha snyad 'dogs so //

column1: tad AkAra anukAri sfuwa ABa tvAt tad pratyakzam avisaMvAdi tvAt ca pramANam iti matam
column2: mngon sum du ni de'i rnam pa'i rjes su byed pa gsal bar snang ba'i phyir dang / mi slu pa'i tshad ma zhes bya bar 'dod do //

column1: acintyaH hi BagavataH sarva arTa aDigamaH
column2: bcom ldan 'das kyis don thams cad thugs su chung pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /

column1: sarvaTA jQAna BiDAna vizaya atIta tvAt
column2: rnam pa thams cad du shes pa dang brjod pa'i yul las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
